trans-unit.source: Provides programmatic access to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_webParts" name="webParts" href=""></xref> configuration file section.
This class cannot be inherited.

The `webParts` configuration file section allows you to specify a Web Parts personalization provider, set personalization authorizations, and add custom classes that extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> class for use by Web Parts connections.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsSection"></xref> class using default settings.
The WebPartsSection constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsSection> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method.
This constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
The following table shows the default settings that are used for this constructor.

|Setting|Default Value| |-------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsSection.Personalization%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsPersonalization> object.| |<xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsSection.Transformers%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfoCollection> collection containing a default <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo> object.|
Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable the export of control data to an XML description file.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable the export of control data to an XML description file; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
To be added.
Gets a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsPersonalization"></xref> object that allows you to specify the Web Parts personalization provider and set Web Parts personalization authorizations.
A <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsPersonalization"></xref> object that allows you to specify the personalization provider and set personalization authorizations.
To be added.
Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> objects.

<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo> objects specify custom classes that extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> class for use by Web Part connections for the ASP.NET applications affected by the configuration file.
These transformer classes act as bridges between connected Web Parts, translating data between Web Parts with incompatible connection points.
A <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfoCollection"></xref> collection of <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> objects.
